title: Location
description: Represents a physical or geographical location.

locationId.description: A unique identifier for the location.

name.description: A common name for the location (e.g., 'Eiffel Tower', 'New York City').

isGeospatial.description: Indicates if the location has specific geographical coordinates.

address.description: The street-level address details of the location.

state.description: The state or province of the location.

coordinates.description: The geographical coordinates of the location.

parentLocationId.description: The unique identifier of a larger, containing location (e.g., the city a building is in).
